My name is Patricia, and I am a Spanish native speaker from Mexico City. I'm certified as a Spanish instructor as a Foreign Language from the Universidad Nacional Aut\xF3noma de M\xE9xico. I've been teaching Spanish since 2016, with students of any age and every level, from basic words to test preparation (DELE), Spanish for tourism, Spanish for teachers, and Mexican cooking.
